channel.title: Atlanta Georgia on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Atlanta Georgia on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: snowedoutatlanta - January 28, 2014 Atlanta snowstorm paralyzes city
item.description:
It's cold here in Ann Arbor, but we more or less know how to deal with it. Not so in Atlanta, where slippery roads led to gridlock on the highways and midnight traffic jams.
From the Atlanta Journal-Constitution: It was a day when a 10-mile commute could take you at least six hours. For those heading from downtown to the burbs, it was even worse. The interstates were a gridlocked mess long before the snow finished falling Tuesday.
